なんとか身を隠すことはできたけど……: I managed to hide myself, but...
葵がやられたのはかなりの痛手ね。: The fact that Aoi was killed is quite a painful blow.

For Momozono-san to have learned such a technique...

More importantly, what we need to think about right now is how to win from here on out.

……ええ。ひとまずはこのまま匍匐飛行で障害を利用して、\n接敵を拒否しながら態勢:
...Yes. For the time being, I'll use the obstacles in my crawling flight.

なっ！？ 急に大声出してどうしたのよ！？: Wha?! Why are you yelling all of a sudden?!
うしろ？ てきてき？ うるう、何を言って――ええっ！？: Behind me? Come at me? Shut up, what are you saying—ehhh!?

お、追いつかれちゃう～～～～！: They're going to catch up to us!

At the end of the match, against the five Sirius Sugar machines

ま、ムカつきはしたけどぉ。聞いてて一理あるな～とは思ったし。: Well, I was annoyed, but listening to it made a lot of sense.
